name: Premium Portfolio Features for Phlox theme
author: averta

sections.description:
Overview

This plugin adds plenty of premium portfolio functionalities to Phlox theme that makes you able to showcase and present your projects in an elegant way.

Demo on Phlox Theme | Documentation | Video tutorials | Support forum

Features

  • Elementor Page builder support (6 Exclusive Portfolio Elements)
  • Portfolio in Grid Layout
  • Portfolio in Grid Layout With Filter Options
  • Portfolio in Masonry Layout
  • Portfolio in Masonry Layout With Filter Options
  • Portfolio in Tiles Layout
  • Customizable Portfolio Archive pages
  • Sticky Header
  • Sticky Footer
  • Fully Responsive
  • Cross Browser IE9+ and Other Modern Browsers

Some demo sites by Phlox theme

  • Minimal Portfolio
  • Modern Shop
  • Real State
  • The Architect
  • Minimal Photography
  • Journey Blog
  • Classic Blog
  • Portfolio Vivid
  • Classic Portfolio
  • Food Blog
  • Default
  • Coming Soon Red
  • Coming Soon Galaxy

Compatible Browsers

  • IE9+
  • Firefox
  • Safari
  • Opera
  • Chrome
  • iOS browser
  • Android browser

Documentations

If you have any question about working with “Phlox Portfolio”, you can take a look at online documentations

Translation

You can start translating this plugin from here: online translation service.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.6 or greater
  • PHP version 5.6.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

This plugin works the best in Phlox Theme

Automatic installation (easiest way)

To do an automatic install of Phlox Portfolio, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Phlox Portfolio”¬ù and click Search Plugins. Once you have found it you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Download auxin-portfolio.zip
  2. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  3. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  4. Select auxin-portfolio.zip from your computer
  5. Click ‘Install Now’
  6. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download auxin-portfolio.zip
  2. Extract the auxin-portfolio directory to your computer
  3. Upload the auxin-portfolio directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to install a WordPress plugin.

Updating

You can use automatic update to update the plugin safely.
sections.faq:
Where can I find Phlox Portfolio documentation and user guides

If you have any question about working with “Phlox Portfolio”, you can take a look at online documentations

If you get stuck you can ask your question here.

Will Phlox Portfolio work with my theme?

No, this plugin only works on Phlox Theme

Where can I report bugs?

Bugs can be reported in our support forums.

Version 2.3.3 / (10.07.2024)

  • [Fix]: Compatibility for WordPress 6.5.5 applied.

  • [Fix]: Minor bugs fixed.

  • [Fix]: Deprecated notices of new version of Elementor fixed.

  • [Fix]: An issue with displaying sidebar on portfolio category page fixed.

  • [New]: New meta options for single portfolio page about customizing header template added.
  • [Fix]: Minor bugs fixed.

  • [Fix]: Minor bugs fixed.

  • [Fix]: Minor bugs fixed.

  • [Fix]: Minor bugs fixed.

Version 1.6.6 / (27.06.2018)

  • [New]: Introducing 4 New portfolio elements for Elementor page builder.
  • [Fix]: Minor bugs fixed.

Version 1.6.2 / (14.06.2018)

  • [Improvement]: Bug fix and under the hood improvements.

  • [Improvement]: Bug fix and prformance Improvement.

Version 1.4.9 / (13.03.2018)

  • [New]: New option to change the breadcrumb label for a portfolio site
  • [Improvement]: Improvement for sticky portfolio metadata in portfolio single page.

Version 1.4.5 / (13.02.2018)

  • [New]: New option for changing the taxonomy slug.
  • [New]: Improvments on single portfolio page.

Version 1.4.0 / (23.01.2018)

  • [New]: New option for new skin of next and previous navigation added.
  • [New]: New options for modifying the title of portfolio archive page.
  • [Fix]: Fixing an issue with wrong number of items in archive page of portfolio.
  • [Fix]: A fix in portfolio filter slug.
  • [New]: New options for hiding the page title in title bar added.
  • [New]: New transition options added to recent portfolio element.
  • [New]: New options for showing and hiding the share and like button added.
  • [New]: New taxonomy for filtering the portfolio items added.
  • [New]: Recent Portfolio tile carousel with light skin added.

Version 1.2.2 / (02.12.2017)

  • [Improvement]: Preview animation added for theme options.
  • [Improvement]: Improvement in portfolio archive page.

Version 1.2.0 / (14.11.2017)

  • [Improvement]: Improvement in portfolio page layouts.
  • [Improvement]: The order of breadcrumb separator items changed.
  • [New]: New portfolio navigation type added.
  • [Fix]: An issue with appearing border around related portfolio items section fixed.

Version 1.1.4 / (1.11.2017)

  • [New]: New options in theme options for title bar setting.
  • [New]: New options for adding a button under related portfolio items added.
  • [Fix]: A bug with undefined variable in single portfolio page fixed.
  • [Fix]: Sidebar options removed from portfolio single pages.
  • [Fix]: The portfolio hover option issue in customizer fixed.

Version 1.1.0 / (23.10.2017)

  • [New]: New layouts added to portfolio single pages.
  • [New]: New option for adding overview title added to portfolio pages.
  • [New]: New option for changing overview alignment added to portfolio pages.
  • [Improvement]: Improvement in responsivess of single portfolio page.
  • [Improvement]: Missing styles added to portfolio pages.
  • [Fix]: An issue with displaying portdolio metadatas in customizer fixed.
  • [Fix]: Issue with next and previous navigation in single portdolio page fixed.

Version 1.0.1 / (19.10.2017)

  • [Improvement]: New options and templates for portfolio single page added
  • [Improvement]: Applying some changes based on latest changes in auxin framework

Version 0.9.7 / (21.06.2017)

  • [Improvement]: Applying some changes based on latest changes in auxin framework

Version 0.9.0 / (21.06.2017)

  • New portfolio layouts added
  • Dependency for auxin-elements plugin added

Version 0.8.0 / (28.2.2017)

  • Initial release
